KeymapArgs Luthetus.Common.RazorLib.Commands.Models.CommonCommandArgs.KeymapArgs[get]
When the command is fired via a keyboard event, there is no mapping done for KeymapArgs.Location, and other miscelaneous information.
So, the KeymapArgs is provided here so one can check the miscelaneous information.
